Name: 0Gravity
About the game: 0Gravity is a game whose action takes place in zero gravity (predictably). Confuse your opponents and anticipate their actions to win in pixel 2D levels. > 2-4 players with one screen (NO SINGLE PLAYER MODE) > Combat system with throws of grenades to the roof > Using recoil shots to accelerate > Pleasant feeling of tearing your rival to pieces in a cosmic vacuum
Meta Title: 0Gravity: Jul 26, 2019, Viktor Kunshin and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on 0Gravity? Check out the release date (Jul 26, 2019), developer insights from Viktor Kunshin, and a complete game summary.
